thread.title: Paul Pogba arrives at Manchester United training after late night watching NBA All Star game
thread.title_full: Paul Pogba arrives at Manchester United training after late night watching NBA All Star game

author: Jack Rathborn
title: Paul Pogba arrives at Manchester United training after late night watching NBA All Star game
text:
Sport Paul Pogba arrives at Manchester United training after late night watching NBA All Star game The French midfielder posted a picture of himself taking in the spectacle in the early hours of this morning Share Paul Pogba arrives for Man United training hours after staying up for the NBA All Star game (Photo: Ben Furst/Mercury Press) Share Get football updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Thank you for subscribing! Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
Paul Pogba has arrived at Manchester United training hours after staying up to watch the NBA All Star game with a huge week ahead for the Red Devils. 
The French midfielder may be feeling slightly worse for wear following a sleep-deprived evening and a substitute appearance in the FA Cup win over Blackburn. 
The West triumphed over the East in the basketball spectacular in the early hours of this morning British time, with Pogba donning a Houston Rockets jersey with James Harden on the back. 
Pogba obscured his face with his phone and wore his hood up on arrival to the Aon Training Complex. Pogba arrives for training after a late night in front of the tv (Photo: Ben Furst/Mercury Press) Pogba obscures his face with his phone (Photo: Ben Furst/Mercury Press) Pogba stayed up late to watch the basketball (Photo: Paul Pogba / Instagram) Read More Manchester United captain Wayne Rooney could miss EFL Cup final vs Southampton, claims Jose Mourinho 
A 3-0 lead against Saint-Etienne should ensure no scares in the second leg of the Europa League round of 32 tie, though Southampton await this weekend in the EFL Cup final. 
It will be an opportunity for the 23-year-old to pick up his first piece of silverware since his record Â£89m move from Juventus last summer. It is the start of a huge week for United (Photo: Ben Furst/Mercury Press) Pogba and Ibrahimovic's introduction against Blackburn proved decisive (Photo: REUTERS) Video Loading Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now
